title: Tech Lead / Senior Data Engineer
description: Leading a small team of engineers building a greenfield platform for automated trading and research at an short-focused equities quantamental hedge fund.

title: Senior Data Scientist (Contract)
description: Short term role to migrate machine learning insurance-tech product from R to Python while implementing software engineering best practices.

title: Data Scientist/Engineer
description: Using Python web scraping libraries to build an automated suite of tools to streamline holiday bookings. Made redundant due to Covid-19.

title: Data Scientist
description: Building a range of user-facing machine learning applications including product recommendations and search optimisations.

title: Junior Data Scientist/Analyst
description: Reporting directly to the CEO and COO, analysing customer cohorts and company financials for board presentations. Implemented anti-money laundering and fraud detection system using machine learning.

title: Technology Analyst Intern
description: Investigating company’s first data science proof-of-concept project, predicting failure of internal servers.
